name: Pair of Commodes
maker: Carving attributed to Joachim Dietrich, and sides after engravings by François de Cuvilliés
description: Pair of Commodes; Carving attributed to Joachim Dietrich (German, 1690 - 1753), and sides after engravings by François de Cuvilliés (French, 1695 - 1768); Munich, Germany; about 1745; Gessoed and carved, painted, and gilded pine; gilt bronze mounts; jaune rose de Bignolles marble top; 72.DA.63; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Pair of Commodes
medium: Gessoed and carved, painted, and gilded pine; gilt bronze mounts; jaune rose de Bignolles marble top
